clauses.title: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking
clauses.description: Users can’t fully opt out of tracking technologies used for non essential purposes such as advertising, marketing or analytics. The user may be asked for consent for installing some tracking technologies on the device, and even if all are rejected the service will still track its visitors and ignore the choice.This case doesn’t apply to functional cookies that are necessary to provide the services.
clauses.clause_text:
Please keep in mind that your browser settings may not permit you to control Advertisers’ technologies, and this Privacy Policy does not apply to, and we cannot control the activities of Advertisers.
If you would like more information about Advertisers’ practices, please see http://optout.aboutads.info/#!/.

case.text: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking

clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).
clauses.clause_text:
• Category G: Geolocation data.

    • We disclose your Personal Information for a Business Purpose to the following categories of third parties:

    • Our corporate affiliates, including BEN Group, Inc.
    • Analytics Providers.
    • Social Media.

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: ubeBuddy uses third party service providers to serve advertisements or collect data on our behalf across the internet and on this Site (“Advertisers”). Some of these Advertisers may collect your Personal Information about your Site visits and your interactions with our products and services to tailor marketing messages on other sites, or to trigger real-time interactions, customize the Site, or enhance your profile. Advertisers may use Cookies

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text:
Some of these Advertisers may collect your Personal Information that you share on the Site via a web form automatically and prior to your submission of the Personal Information (i.e., before you click, “Submit”).
Advertisers may be able to use information from your Site visits to send marketing messages to you in a way that could personally identify you.
The information collected by Advertisers may include your IP address, email addresses and other user and device level information.

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: For marketing and promotions.

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: This data may include, without limitation, your IP address, browser type and language, referring/exit pages and URLs,

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: We may also collect Personal Information from third parties, such as Social Media, Payment Processors, product vendors, and other partners.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: To evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of our assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Information held by us about our users is among the assets transferred or liquidated.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: We may use Pixels to automatically record certain technical information about your interactions when you visit the Site or otherwise engage with us, to help deliver Cookies on our Site, or count users who have visited the Site.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text: We, and the third parties we engage, may combine information we collect from you over time, and across the Site, with information obtained from other sources.

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.
clauses.clause_text:
G.
Geolocation data.
Physical location or movements.
YES

case.text: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

clauses.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text: To personalize your experience and to deliver content and product and service offerings, products, and services relevant to your interests, including offers and advertisements through third-party sites

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text:
Affiliated persons or third-party service providers assisting us in the operation, management, improvement, research and analysis of the Site.

Please note: Affiliated persons or our third party service providers may augment, extend, and combine non-personally identifiable information with data from additional third party sources in order to assist us in our operation of the Site.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: We also use Google Analytics and other third party analytics providers (“Analytics Providers”) to collect information about Site usage and the users of the Site. These Analytics Providers use Cookies

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text: We may also include web beacons in our promotional e-mail messages or newsletters to determine whether you open or act on them for statistical purposes.

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
clauses.description: The service does not require users to reveal personal information for most of its website. However, it may still collect anonymous logs.
clauses.clause_text: When you visit the Site without creating an account, you can browse without submitting Personal Information about yourself

case.text: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: THE INFORMATION WE COLLECT

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell Personal Information and have not sold Personal Information in the preceding twelve (12) months.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.
clauses.clause_text: This Privacy Policy complies with the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (“CCPA”)

case.text: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Please note: If you restrict, disable, or block any or all Cookies from your web browser or mobile or other device, the Site may not operate properly, and you may not have access to certain services or parts of the Site.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Effective Date: 06/15/2021

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We may use non-personally identifiable information, such as anonymized and/or aggregated Site usage data, in any manner that does not identify individual users for the purpose of improving the operation and management of the Site, including to develop new features, functionality, and services, to conduct internal research, to better understand Site usage patterns, to resolve disputes, to troubleshoot problems, to fulfill user requests, or for security and compliance purposes.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: Our collection of data through Cookies includes information about your browser and Site usage patterns, which may include your IP address

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
